org.sindice.siren.qparser.json.dsl

Class AbstractNodeQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sindice.siren.qparser.json.dsl.AbstractQuery
      • org.sindice.siren.qparser.json.dsl.AbstractNodeQuery
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NodeQuery, TwigQuery

    public abstract class AbstractNodeQuery
extends AbstractQuery
    Abstract class that represents a top-level node query object (either node or twig query) of the JSON query syntax.
